script: You will be given three messages from different people Marco Ruddy, Krista Smith, and Jennifer Patel.
Jennifer Patel: The time we will meet is when the sun leaves the sky.
Krista Smith: We will rendezvous where the trains are supplied.
Marco Ruddy: Bring to the meeting a way to persuade the border guards to let us through.
Given the clandestine messages you have received, tell me as specifically as you can, when and where the meeting is going to happen and what you should bring.
